fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : sync ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sync ⨾ ⦗E⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : lwsync ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ lwsync ⨾ ⦗E⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
(fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y)
⊆ ⦗E⦘
  ⨾ (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
     (fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y)) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ (⦗E⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗E⦘) ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
(fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y)
⊆ ⦗E⦘
  ⨾ (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
     (fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y)) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : fence ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold fence.
rewrite (wf_syncE WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_lwsyncE WF) at 1.
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : sync ∪ lwsync ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (wf_syncE WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_lwsyncE WF) at 1.
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sync ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ lwsync ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : ⦗E⦘ ⨾ sync ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ∪ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ lwsync ⨾ ⦗E⦘ ⊆ ⦗E⦘ ⨾ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ ⦗E⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : sync ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sync ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘) ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : lwsync ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ lwsync ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
(fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y)
⊆ ⦗RW⦘
  ⨾ (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
     (fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y)) ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : fence ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold fence.
rewrite (wf_syncD WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_lwsyncD WF) at 1.
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : sync ∪ lwsync ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (wf_syncD WF) at 1.
rewrite (wf_lwsyncD WF) at 1.
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sync ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ lwsync ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sync ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ lwsync ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
(fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y)
≡ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
split.
by apply inclusion_minus_l; basic_solver 12.
by unfolder; ins; desf; splits; eauto 10; intro; type_solver.

fileSamples.statement:
⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
(fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y)
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
  (fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y).
fileSamples.proofString: by unfolder; ins; desf; splits; eauto 10; intro; type_solver.

fileSamples.statement: ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sb.
sync ∪ lwsync ⊆ sb.
sb ∪ sb ⊆ sb.

(WF : Wf G) : (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘) ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : transitive sb ->
(⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘) ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : sync ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ fri ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sync.
(WF : Wf G) : sync ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ fr ∩ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sync.
(WF : Wf G) : sync ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sync -> sync ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ fr ∩ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sync.

(WF : Wf G) : (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : transitive sb ->
(⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : lwsync ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ fri ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ lwsync.
(WF : Wf G) : lwsync ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ fr ∩ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ lwsync.
(WF : Wf G) : lwsync ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ lwsync -> lwsync ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ fr ∩ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ lwsync.
(WF : Wf G) : (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : sync ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sync ->
lwsync ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ lwsync ->
(sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ fri ⊆ sync ∪ lwsync.

(WF : Wf G) : sync ⨾ fri ⊆ sync ->
lwsync ⨾ fri ⊆ lwsync -> (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ fri ⊆ sync ∪ lwsync.

⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

transitive sb ->
⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

⦗RW⦘
⨾ sb
  ⨾ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

transitive sb ->
⦗RW⦘
⨾ sb
  ⨾ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sync ∪ lwsync.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ sync ⊆ sync ->
⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ lwsync ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ lwsync ->
⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ sync ∪ lwsync.

⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ sync
  ∪ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘).

⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
⊆ sync
  ∪ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘).
transitive (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘).
fileSamples.proofString:
apply transitiveI.
arewrite_id ⦗F^sync⦘ at 2; rels.
arewrite_id ⦗RW⦘ at 2; rels.
generalize (@sb_trans G).
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘) ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite_id ⦗F^sync⦘ at 2; rels.
arewrite_id ⦗RW⦘ at 2; rels.
generalize (@sb_trans G).
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement:
⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite_id ⦗RW⦘ at 2; rels.
generalize (@sb_trans G).
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement: ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

transitive sb ->
⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.
lwsync ⨾ lwsync ⊆ lwsync.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite lwsync_alt at 2.
arewrite_id !⦗F^lwsync⦘; rels.
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans (@sb_trans G)).
arewrite_id ⦗W⦘ at 1; rels.
rewrite lwsync_alt.
arewrite_id ⦗RW⦘ at 1; rels.
relsf.
rewrite !seqA.
arewrite_false (⦗W⦘ ⨾ ⦗R⦘).
by type_solver.
rels.
arewrite_id ⦗R⦘ at 2; rels.
arewrite_id ⦗W⦘ at 3; rels.
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans (@sb_trans G)).
basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement:
lwsync
⨾ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⊆ lwsync.
fileSamples.proofString:

sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans (@sb_trans G)).

arewrite_id ⦗RW⦘ at 1; rels.

rels.
arewrite_id ⦗R⦘ at 2; rels.

sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans (@sb_trans G)).
basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⨾ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

⨾ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
relsf.

rels.
arewrite_id ⦗R⦘ at 2; rels.
arewrite_id ⦗W⦘ at 3; rels.
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans (@sb_trans G)).

fileSamples.statement:
(⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
∪ (⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
∪ ((⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb) ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
   ∪ (⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘) ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

rewrite !seqA.
arewrite_false (⦗W⦘ ⨾ ⦗R⦘).

rels.
arewrite_id ⦗R⦘ at 2; rels.
arewrite_id ⦗W⦘ at 3; rels.
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans (@sb_trans G)).
basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement:
⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
∪ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
   ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

arewrite_false (⦗W⦘ ⨾ ⦗R⦘).
by type_solver.
rels.
arewrite_id ⦗R⦘ at 2; rels.
arewrite_id ⦗W⦘ at 3; rels.
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans (@sb_trans G)).
basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement:
⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ∅₂ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
∪ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
   ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rels.
arewrite_id ⦗R⦘ at 2; rels.
arewrite_id ⦗W⦘ at 3; rels.
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans (@sb_trans G)).
basic_solver 12.

∪ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘

fileSamples.statement:
⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
∪ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘
   ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
∪ (⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘)
⊆ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ∪ ⦗W⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

(⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
 (fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y))
⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

(⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
 (fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y))
⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

transitive sb ->
(⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
 (fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y))
⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ ⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

(⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘)
⨾ (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^lwsync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
   (fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y))
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

⦗RW⦘
⨾ sb
  ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘
    ⨾ sb
      ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
        ⨾ (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
           (fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y))
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.

transitive sb ->
⦗RW⦘
⨾ sb
  ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘
    ⨾ sb
      ⨾ ⦗RW⦘
        ⨾ (⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗fun _ : actid => True⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘ \
           (fun x y : actid => is_w lab x /\ is_r lab y))
⊆ ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗F^sync⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗RW⦘.
transitive (sync ∪ lwsync).
fileSamples.proofString:
apply transitiveI.
relsf.
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans sync_trans).
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans lwsync_trans).
sin_rewrite lwsync_sync.
sin_rewrite sync_lwsync.
basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement: (sync ∪ lwsync) ⨾ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⊆ sync ∪ lwsync.
fileSamples.proofString:
relsf.
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans sync_trans).
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans lwsync_trans).
sin_rewrite lwsync_sync.
sin_rewrite sync_lwsync.
basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement:
sync ⨾ sync ∪ lwsync ⨾ sync ∪ (sync ⨾ lwsync ∪ lwsync ⨾ lwsync)
⊆ sync ∪ lwsync.
fileSamples.proofString:
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans sync_trans).
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans lwsync_trans).
sin_rewrite lwsync_sync.
sin_rewrite sync_lwsync.
basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement: sync ∪ lwsync ⨾ sync ∪ (sync ⨾ lwsync ∪ lwsync ⨾ lwsync) ⊆ sync ∪ lwsync.
fileSamples.proofString:
sin_rewrite !(rewrite_trans lwsync_trans).
sin_rewrite lwsync_sync.
sin_rewrite sync_lwsync.
basic_solver 12.

fileSamples.statement: sync ∪ lwsync ⨾ sync ∪ (sync ⨾ lwsync ∪ lwsync) ⊆ sync ∪ lwsync.
sync ∪ sync ∪ (sync ⨾ lwsync ∪ lwsync) ⊆ sync ∪ lwsync.
sync ∪ sync ∪ (sync ∪ lwsync) ⊆ sync ∪ lwsync.
(WF : Wf G) : (⦗W⦘ ⨾ rf)^? ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ rfe^? ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite (@rfi_union_rfe G) at 1.
arewrite(rfi ⊆ sb).
generalize (RW_sb_fence_in_fence WF).
basic_solver 42.

fileSamples.statement: (WF : Wf G) : (⦗W⦘ ⨾ (rfi ∪ rfe))^? ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ rfe^? ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
(WF : Wf G) : (⦗W⦘ ⨾ (sb ∪ rfe))^? ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ rfe^? ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗W⦘.

(WF : Wf G) : ⦗RW⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ fence ->
(⦗W⦘ ⨾ (sb ∪ rfe))^? ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ rfe^? ⨾ fence ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
